coreQueryPageProvider.name: USER_SAVED_SEARCHES
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FacetedSearch WHERE dc:creator = ? AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation'

coreQueryPageProvider.name: OTHER_USERS_SAVED_SEARCHES
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FacetedSearch WHERE dc:creator != ? AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation'

coreQueryPageProvider.name: DEFAULT_DOCUMENT_SUGGESTION
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:fulltext_title LIKE '?' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted'
